tile2.description:
Mark Badgley and James Mischka, the designers behind Badgley Mischka, discuss their sleek and modern home collection at High Point. These designers specialize in creating fashionable and upscale furniture for bedrooms and living rooms and even make dog dishes. One of their greatest pieces is a beautiful black desk with a surfboard finish. They feel fashion and home can complement each other well. When coming up with ideas for furniture they always make sure to stay true to their brand. The furniture doesn't have to follow a trend but should display the meaning behind their company, which is elegance. 

You can view and shop their collections here:

https://www.badgleymischka.com/home-collection/

#house #badgleymischka #homecollection #design #furnitureshowcase #highpointmarket #interiordesign #bedroom #livingroom
tile2.title: Badgley Mischka Furniture Showcase at  High Point Market

tile3.description: Frank Owen Gehry has been a force in the world of architecture and design for over eight decades, and he’s become one of the world’s best known contemporary architects.
tile3.title: Frank Owen Gehry Educates, Inspires, and Delights at Las Vegas Market

tile4.description:
Some design companies have only the elite in mind, but Alder & Tweed Home Outfitters is all about bringing style and design to the everyday consumer.

House met with Ryan Humphrey of this family-owned company at Las Vegas Market this summer, and learned how inspirations come to the United States – and to your own living room or dining room – sometimes from afar.

A new upholstery line showcased at Market is an example of fashion-forward designer fabrics from overseas that can make for stylish seating when paired with exposed hardwood frames.

We found a lot of mixed mediums in this Utah company’s designs, such as top-grain leathers, solid hardwood, marble, and even metals.

“We design everything from start to finish ourselves,” Humphrey told House.

Often that means visiting tanneries, fabric mills, and factories, and collaborating with a design team for the freshest styles to hit your home.

Find Alder & Tweed products in both boutiques and mass retail stores including international markets.
tile4.title: Alder & Tweed Goes Round World to Create Style for Everyday Customers | Pro Perspectives

slider.slideText: House is a full-service website for homeowners, interior designers, homebuilders, architects, home service professionals, and potential homebuyers.
